actions.text: Referred to House Committee on House Administration.

official_title: A resolution limiting the amount provided in expense resolutions for each committee of the House for the first session of the Ninety-eighth Congress to the amount expended by such committee under such resolutions for the second session of the Ninety-seventh Congress, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Limits the total amount provided in expense resolutions for each House committee for the first session of the 98th Congress to the amount expended by such committee for the second session of the 97th Congress. Limits the amount provided in such expense resolutions for the Select Committee on Children, Youth, and Families to the amount specified in H. Res. 122, 98th Congress.

titles.title: A resolution limiting the amount provided in expense resolutions for each committee of the House for the first session of the Ninety-eighth Congress to the amount expended by such committee under such resolutions for the second session of the Ninety-seventh Congress, and for other purposes.
